item.title: Most teenagers dislike today’s news media and journalists
item.description: When asked for one word to describe today’s news media, 84% of teens surveyed responded with something negative. Cat Murphy, a college student, has wanted to be a journalist since she was 11. Many of her friends don’t understand why.

item.title: MKBHD is taking down his wallpaper app

The Panels launch in September 2024 was […]

item.title: Why Don’t Norwegians Hate Tesla Like the Rest of Europe Does?
item.description: November’s Tesla registrations were down in France, Sweden, Denmark, and Germany. Norway, however, is bucking the trend—thanks to a tax incentive system that will soon be rolled back.

item.title: Housing market delistings just hit a decade high—raising one big question
item.description: Looking ahead, the outstanding question is how many of these delistings will return to the housing market in spring 2026. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: Bon plan Apple : le MacBook Air M4 chute à 819 € sur Amazon, encore trois heures de remise
item.description: Oubliez les anciens M2 ou M3. Amazon vient de brader le tout dernier MacBook Air M4 à 819 €. C'est une baisse historique de 270 € sur l'ordinateur portable le plus équilibré du marché. À ce prix, le stock ne tiendra pas la journée.

item.title: Careful! That calendar notification could be loaded with malware - here's how to stay safe

item.title: New York Gaming Commission approves 3 new casino licenses
item.description: Gov. Kathy Hochul said the casinos promise to unlock billions of dollars in funding for the state’s transit system. New York City is poised to get its first Vegas-style casinos, including one next to the home stadium of baseball’s New York Mets and another that could see a windfall for President Donald Trump.

item.description: "I pinch myself going to work every day," one 51-year-old says of his new supervisor role overseeing 200 workers at a data center site.

item.title: Data center energy demand forecasted to soar nearly 300% through 2035
item.description: New planned data centers promise to consume even more energy than expected. Meanwhile, a grid monitor is blaming such growth for high electricity prices.

item.title: Microsoft’s ugly sweaters return with Clippy, Xbox, and Zune brown options
item.description: Microsoft is bringing back its ugly sweaters for the holiday season. After taking a break for 2024, the company has an “Artifact” holiday sweater with lots of retro iconography, an even uglier Zune brown option, and even a green Xbox version. Clippy was the star of Microsoft’s ugly sweater in 2022, and the Artifact option […]

item.title: Google Météo, c’est fini : tout ce qui change sur Android et notre meilleure alternative
item.description: C'est un petit rituel qui disparaît. Depuis des années, appuyer sur l'icône Météo de Google lançait une interface propre, soignée, avec cette fameuse grenouille "Froggy". C'était simple, efficace et agréable. C'est fini. Google a décidé de tout casser pour remplacer cette expérience par une vulgaire page de résultats de recherche.

item.title: Don’t miss the hot deal on this popular Dreo electric heater – save over £22 this Cyber Monday
item.description: Black Friday may be over, but there's still over a third off this popular Dreo electric heater.

item.title: Lower student loan bills may be coming — even for high earners
item.description: Federal officials say December will bring easier access to an income-driven plan that caps payments at a share of discretionary income. Here’s some good news: If you have student loan debt, you could soon qualify for a repayment plan that comes with lower monthly bills.

item.title: Nespresso pods recycled into compost will help restore California soil after devastating wildfires tore through L.A.
item.description: The Swiss brand will donate 100,000 pounds of compost, made from recycled coffee capsules, to a Los Angeles nonprofit that is planting trees across the city. If you’ve recycled a Nespresso capsule recently, your spent coffee grounds could help Los Angeles recover from the devastating January 2025 wildfires.

item.title: SSDs for PC gamers – big savings on drives from Crucial, Samsung, WD_Black, and more
item.description: Running out of space or need a speed upgrade? Good news: there are some great deals this Cyber Monday on the best SSDs for PC gamers.

item.title: La fin du nano-ordinateur pas cher ? Raspberry Pi revoit ses prix à la hausse
item.description: Vous trouviez le Raspberry Pi 5 un peu cher ? Ça ne va pas s'arranger. Face à la flambée des prix de la RAM, Raspberry Pi n'a plus le choix : tous les modèles Pi 5 augmentent. Pour compenser, une nouvelle variante avec seulement 1 Go de RAM débarque. La situation est simple : l'intelligence artificielle commence à coûter cher aux makers.

item.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 got its first-ever discount during Cyber Monday

item.title: Amazon’s Atrocious AI Anime Dubs Are a Dark Sign of Things to Come
item.description: Prime Video has begun rolling out a supposed beta test using generative AI voices to dub anime—but they're a bad sign regardless of their dismaying quality.
